post_message: Today, Senator Nelson and I urged the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA) to provide assistance to the small businesses in the Orlando area that have been closed off to the public in the aftermath of the Orlando attacks. In a letter to SBA Administrator Maria Contreras-Sweet, we requested assistance to the affected businesses, such as disaster relief loans. Read the letter here: @webpagelink
